MAPPING.DESCRIPTION:
Author: Raghavendar Joshi
Desc: This mapping loads the DIM_RES_DOC_ECARS2_WORK2 using RENT_CNTRCT_ASSOC and DIM_RES_DOC_ECARS2_WORK1 tables as source.
MAPPING.NAME: m_DIM_RES_DOCUMENT_ECARS2_WORK2_Preload

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This transformation runs the script from the SQL query and does the following 1. Delete data from DIM_RES_DOC_ECARS2_WORK2 2. Load data into DIM_RES_DOC_ECARS2_WORK2 using ASSOC and DIM_RES_DOC_ECARS2_WORK2 table.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQL_Load_Work_Table2

METADATAEXTENSION.NAME: Query_Description
METADATAEXTENSION.VALUE: This query loads data into DIM_RES_DOC_ECARS2_WORK2 table from ASSOC and DIM_RES_DOC_ECARS2_WORK1 table based on the condition in query

METADATAEXTENSION.NAME: SQL_Query
METADATAEXTENSION.VALUE: DELETE FROM ~DB_IRDW_WT~.DIM_RES_DOC_ECARS2_WORK2 ALL; INSERT INTO ~DB_IRDW_WT~.DIM_RES_DOC_ECARS2_WORK2 ( RENT_CNTRCT_NBR ,RC_EFF_STRT_TSP ,RENT_CNTRCT_STAT_CDE ,RENT_TYP_CDE -- CQ 190730 ,GUI_RESV_NBR ,LGCY_RESV_NBR ,CUST_RATE_SRCE_NBR ,CREATE_TIMESTAMP ,UPDATE_TIMESTAMP ,PCKUP_DTE ,RTN_DTE ,RESV_ORIG_CDE ,PCKUP_IORG_ID ,RTN_IORG_ID ,CRTE_IORG_ID ,child_rent_cntrct_nbr ,RCA_EFF_STRT_TSP ,ASSOC_rent_doc_CD ,CREATED_BY ,ERAC_ALT_RESV_NBR ) SELECT DISTINCT R.RENT_CNTRCT_NBR ,R.EFF_STRT_TSP ,R.RENT_CNTRCT_STAT_CDE ,RENT_TYP_CDE -- CQ 190730 ,R.GUI_RESV_NBR ,RCA.LGCY_RESV_NBR ,R.CUST_RATE_SRCE_NBR ,R.CREATE_TIMESTAMP ,R.UPDATE_TIMESTAMP ,R.PCKUP_DTE ,R.RTN_DTE ,R.RESV_ORIG_CDE ,R.PCKUP_IORG_ID ,R.RTN_IORG_ID ,R.CRTE_IORG_ID ,RCA.child_rent_cntrct_nbr ,RCA.EFF_STRT_TSP ,RCA.ASSOC_RENT_DOC_CD ,R.CREATED_BY ,R.ERAC_ALT_RESV_NBR --- Dw1667 FROM ~DB_IRDW_WT~.DIM_RES_DOC_ECARS2_WORK1 R LEFT JOIN ( select r.rent_cntrct_nbr, RC.GUI_RESV_NBR AS ASSOC_RENT_DOC_CD, RC.lgcy_resv_nbr, RCA.child_rent_cntrct_nbr , rca.eff_strt_tsp from ~DB_ECARS2~.RENT_CNTRCT_ASSOC rca INNER JOIN ~DB_IRDW_WT~.DIM_RES_DOC_ECARS2_WORK1 R ON RCA.CHILD_RENT_CNTRCT_NBR = R.RENT_CNTRCT_NBR AND rca.row_stat_cde='A' INNER JOIN ~DB_ECARS2~.RENT_CNTRCT rc ON rc.RENT_CNTRCT_NBR = RCA.PARNT_RENT_CNTRCT_NBR QUALIFY ( ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY r.rent_cntrct_nbr ORDER BY rca.eff_strt_tsp DESC, rca.create_timestamp DESC ))= 1 ) RCA ON rca.rent_cntrct_nbr = r.rent_cntrct_nbr ;

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This transformation passes the selected records from source.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_DIM_RES_DOC_Script

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This transformation passes the database names from the parameter values.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_GATHER

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This transformation runs the script from the SQL query and does the following 1. Delete data from DIM_RES_DOC_ECARS2_WORK2 2. Load data into DIM_RES_DOC_ECARS2_WORK2 using ASSOC and DIM_RES_DOC_ECARS2_WORK2 table.
INSTANCE.NAME: SQL_Load_Work_Table2

INSTANCE.NAME: SQ_DIM_RES_DOC_Script

MAPPING.DESCRIPTION:
Author: Raghavendar Joshi
Desc: This mapping loads the DIM_RES_DOC_ECARS2_WORK3 using DRVR table as source.
MAPPING.NAME: m_DIM_RES_DOCUMENT_ECARS2_WORK3_Preload

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This transformation passes the selected records from source.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_DIM_RES_DOC_Script

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This transformation runs the script from the SQL query and does the following 1. Delete data from DIM_RES_DOC_ECARS2_WORK3 2. Load data into DIM_RES_DOC_ECARS2_WORK3 using DRVR table.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQL_Load_Work_Table3

METADATAEXTENSION.NAME: Query_Description
METADATAEXTENSION.VALUE: This query loads data into DIM_RES_DOC_ECARS2_WORK3 table from DRVR table based on the condition in query

METADATAEXTENSION.NAME: SQL_Query
METADATAEXTENSION.VALUE: DELETE FROM ~DB_IRDW_WT~.DIM_RES_DOC_ECARS2_WORK3 ALL; INSERT INTO ~DB_IRDW_WT~.DIM_RES_DOC_ECARS2_WORK3 ( RENT_CNTRCT_NBR ,RENTR_RECOG_ID ,FNAM ,LNAM ,LOYALTY_CLUB_FLG ) SELECT DISTINCT RENT_CNTRCT_NBR, COALESCE(RENTR_RECOG_ID,0) (NAMED RENTR_RECOG_ID) , FNAM, LNAM ,CASE WHEN RENTR_RECOG_ID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END (NAMED LOYALTY_CLUB_FLG) --RENTL00161923 Attribute Subchannels to ECARS Reservations FROM ~DB_ECARS2~.DRVR WHERE DRVR_ID=1 AND RENT_CNTRCT_NBR IN ( SELECT RENT_CNTRCT_NBR FROM ~DB_IRDW_WT~.DIM_RES_DOC_ECARS2_WORK1 ) ;

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This transformation passes the database names from the parameter values.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_GATHER

INSTANCE.NAME: SQ_DIM_RES_DOC_Script

INSTANCE.NAME: SQL_Load_Work_Table3

INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_GATHER

MAPPING.DESCRIPTION:
Author: Raghavendar Joshi
Desc: This mapping loads the DIM_RES_DOC_ECARS2_WORK1 using RENT_CNTRCT table as source.
MAPPING.NAME: m_DIM_RES_DOCUMENT_ECARS2_WORK1_Preload

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This transformation passes the database names from the parameter values.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_GATHER

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This transformation passes the record from source.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_DIM_RES_DOC_Script

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This transformation runs the script from the SQL query and does the following 1. Delete data from DIM_RES_DOC_ECARS2_WORK1 2. Load data into DIM_RES_DOC_ECARS2_WORK1 using RENT_CNTRCT table.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQL_Load_Work_Table1

METADATAEXTENSION.NAME: Query_Description
METADATAEXTENSION.VALUE: This query loads data into DIM_RES_DOC_ECARS2_WORK1 table from RENT_CNTRCT table based on the condition in query

METADATAEXTENSION.NAME: SQL_Query
METADATAEXTENSION.VALUE:
DELETE FROM ~DB_IRDW_WT~.DIM_RES_DOC_ECARS2_WORK1 ALL ;
INSERT INTO ~DB_IRDW_WT~.DIM_RES_DOC_ECARS2_WORK1 ( RENT_CNTRCT_NBR ,EFF_STRT_TSP ,GUI_RESV_NBR ,LGCY_RESV_NBR ,CUST_RATE_SRCE_NBR ,CREATE_TIMESTAMP ,UPDATE_TIMESTAMP ,RENT_CNTRCT_STAT_CDE ,RENT_TYP_CDE -- CQ 190730 ,PCKUP_DTE ,RTN_DTE ,RESV_ORIG_CDE ,PCKUP_IORG_ID ,RTN_IORG_ID ,CRTE_IORG_ID ,CREATED_BY ,ERAC_ALT_RESV_NBR ) SELECT DISTINCT RENT_CNTRCT_NBR ,EFF_STRT_TSP ,GUI_RESV_NBR ,LGCY_RESV_NBR ,CUST_RATE_SRCE_NBR ,CREATE_TIMESTAMP ,UPDATE_TIMESTAMP ,RENT_CNTRCT_STAT_CDE ,RENT_TYP_CDE -- CQ 190730 ,PCKUP_DTE ,RTN_DTE ,RESV_ORIG_CDE ,PCKUP_IORG_ID ,RTN_IORG_ID ,CRTE_IORG_ID ,CASE WHEN CREATED_BY IN ( 'EGATE', 'ECARS 1.0', 'EINTNT') THEN NULL ELSE CREATED_BY END AS CREATED_BY ,w.ALT_RESV_NBR as ERAC_ALT_RESV_NBR --- Dw1667 FROM ~DB_ECARS2~.RENT_CNTRCT w CROSS JOIN ~DB_IRDW_WT~.ERAC_DATEPARMS Z WHERE W.RENT_CNTRCT_STAT_CDE IN (5,6,7,10,11) AND W.eff_strt_tsp >= Z.START_CST_TSP AND W.eff_strt_tsp < Z.END_CST_TSP AND w. RESV_ORIG_CDE IN(1,2) -- CQ-169928 -- Ignore records that were updated because they were purged from the ECARS. 2.0 source system - ignore records WITH -- row_stat_cde = 'I' unless ERAC_CT_TO_GMT(EFF_STRT_TSP) IS less than 30 days later than the CREATE_TIMESTAMP (GMT) AND(W.ROW_STAT_CDE='A' OR(W.ROW_STAT_CDE='I' AND(SYSLIB.ERAC_CT_TO_GMT(W.EFF_STRT_TSP)(DATE))-(W.CREATE_TIMESTAMP(DATE)) < 30) ) ;

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This transformation passes the database names from the parameter values.
INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_GATHER

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This transformation passes the record from source.
INSTANCE.NAME: SQ_DIM_RES_DOC_Script

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This transformation runs the script from the SQL query and does the following 1. Delete data from DIM_RES_DOC_ECARS2_WORK1 2. Load data into DIM_RES_DOC_ECARS2_WORK1 using RENT_CNTRCT table.
INSTANCE.NAME: SQL_Load_Work_Table1

SESSION.DESCRIPTION: This session loads the DIM_RES_DOC_ECARS2_WORK1 table.
SESSION.NAME: s_m_DIM_RES_DOCUMENT_ECARS2_WORK1_Preload

Allow Pushdown for User Incompatible Connections
